name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 107,236 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Engrave a ritual seal into your skin binding you to the shadows, granting yourself 3,642 Strength.

Your spells and abilities have a low chance to reduce one of your secondary stats by 3,770 for 10 sec during combat.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have the chance to ignite your target with Radiant Focus for 15 sec. 

After dealing up to 1.9 million damage to the target, the focused energies ignite you with Radiance, granting between 391 to 782 of your highest Secondary stat based on damage dealt for 15 sec.
Equip: You champion the cause of Silvermoon City.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
